test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

        return 'Unknown'

        'Lady': 'Mrs', 'Countess': 'Mrs', 'Jonkheer': 'Mr'
    }
    return title_map.get(title, 'Unknown')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

test_df['Title'] = title_encoder.transform(test_df['Title'])

test_df['Embarked'] = embarked_encoder.transform(test_df['Embarked'])

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import xgboost as xgb
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Feature engineering
# 1. Create family size feature
train_df['FamilySize'] = train_df['SibSp'] + train_df['Parch'] + 1
test_df['FamilySize'] = test_df['SibSp'] + test_df['Parch'] + 1

# 2. Create is_alone binary feature
train_df['IsAlone'] = (train_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)
test_df['IsAlone'] = (test_df['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# 3. Extract title from name
def extract_title(name):
    if pd.isna(name):
        return 'Unknown'
    title = name.split(',')[1].split('.')[0].strip()
    title_map = {
        'Mr': 'Mr', 'Mrs': 'Mrs', 'Miss': 'Miss', 'Master': 'Master',
        'Dr': 'Dr', 'Rev': 'Rev', 'Col': 'Col', 'Major': 'Major',
        'Mlle': 'Miss', 'Mme': 'Mrs', 'Don': 'Mr', 'Sir': 'Mr',
        'Lady': 'Mrs', 'Countess': 'Mrs', 'Jonkheer': 'Mr'
    }
    return title_map.get(title, 'Unknown')

train_df['Title'] = train_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)
test_df['Title'] = test_df['Name'].apply(extract_title)

# 4. Encode categorical variables
sex_encoder = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Sex'] = sex_encoder.fit_transform(train_df['Sex'])
test_df['Sex'] = sex_encoder.transform(test_df['Sex'])

title_encoder = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Title'] = title_encoder.fit_transform(train_df['Title'])
test_df['Title'] = title_encoder.transform(test_df['Title'])

embarked_encoder = LabelEncoder()
train_df['Embarked'] = embarked_encoder.fit_transform(train_df['Embarked'])
test_df['Embarked'] = embarked_encoder.transform(test_df['Embarked'])

# 5. Fill missing values
# Age: fill with median
train_df['Age'].fillna(train_df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)
test_df['Age'].fillna(test_df['Age'].median(), inplace=True)

# Fare: fill with median
train_df['Fare'].fillna(train_df['Fare
